thread.title: BRIEF-Devon Energy Announces Early Tender Results, Results Of Consent Solicitations And Upsizing Of Tender Offers

title: BRIEF-Devon Energy Announces Early Tender Results, Results Of Consent Solicitations And Upsizing Of Tender Offers

organizations.name: brief-devon energy announces early tender results

text: March 21, 2018 / 1:21 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Devon Energy Announces Early Tender Results, Results Of Consent Solicitations And Upsizing Of Tender Offers Reuters Staff March 21 (Reuters) - Devon Energy Corp: * DEVON ENERGY ANNOUNCES EARLY TENDER RESULTS, RESULTS OF CONSENT SOLICITATIONS AND UPSIZING OF TENDER OFFERS * DEVON ENERGY- RECEIVED REQUISITE CONSENTS RELATED TO CONSENT SOLICITATIONS TO ADOPT SOME PROPOSED AMENDMENTS TO INDENTURE GOVERNING 7.950% DEBENTURES DUE 2032 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
